(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Advertorial)))


root(ROOT-0, Advertorial-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
        (ADVP (RB usually))
        (VP (VB watch)
          (NP (NN dramas)))))
    (CC but)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN one))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (ADVP (RB really))
            (VP (VBD enjoyed)))))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (NP (DT The) (NNP Little) (NNP Nonya))))
    (. .)))

aux(watch-5, do-2)
neg(watch-5, n't-3)
advmod(watch-5, usually-4)
root(ROOT-0, watch-5)
dobj(watch-5, dramas-6)
cc(watch-5, but-7)
det(one-9, the-8)
nsubj(Nonya-16, one-9)
nsubj(enjoyed-12, which-10)
advmod(enjoyed-12, really-11)
rcmod(one-9, enjoyed-12)
cop(Nonya-16, was-13)
det(Nonya-16, The-14)
nn(Nonya-16, Little-15)
conj(watch-5, Nonya-16)
